intro: I currently hold an AS in Information Technology with an emphasis in Cybersecurity. I have experience working at my college's help desk, in the IT department as both a volunteer and a student assistant. In addition to my proficiency as IT support I am skilled at problem solving and providing excellent customer service. My greatest learning experience however was as a surge laborer for Dell in their Cheyenne, WY data center. I have a passion for technology and love to learn. I love helping others with their computing problems as well as keeping my computing skills up to date. I have a passion for learning new technologies and learning new ways to solve problems.
